sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.MSN_ID, A.MSN_NM, A.MSN_DESC, A.MSN_TP, A.ROBO_CNT, A.ROBO_MAIN, A.ROBO_SUB1, A.ROBO_SUB2, A.ROBO_SUB3, A.ROBO_SUB4, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT FROM MSN_MST A
$WHERE_OPTION$
ORDER BY A.SORTS LIMIT #START_NO#, #PAGE_CNT#

SELECT A.MSN_ID, A.MSN_NM, A.MSN_DESC, A.MSN_TP, A.ROBO_CNT, A.ROBO_MAIN, A.ROBO_SUB1, A.ROBO_SUB2, A.ROBO_SUB3, A.ROBO_SUB4, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT FROM MSN_MST A
$WHERE_OPTION$
ORDER BY A.SORTS
SELECT A.MSN_ID, A.MSN_NM, A.MSN_DESC, A.MSN_TP, A.ROBO_CNT, A.ROBO_MAIN, A.ROBO_SUB1, A.ROBO_SUB2, A.ROBO_SUB3, A.ROBO_SUB4, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT FROM MSN_MST A WHERE MSN_ID = #MSN_ID#
sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO MSN_MST( MSN_NM, MSN_DESC, MSN_TP, ROBO_CNT, ROBO_MAIN, ROBO_SUB1, ROBO_SUB2, ROBO_SUB3, ROBO_SUB4, SORTS, REG_DT ) VALUES (#MSN_NM#, #MSN_DESC#, #MSN_TP#, #ROBO_CNT#, #ROBO_MAIN#, #ROBO_SUB1#, #ROBO_SUB2#, #ROBO_SUB3#, #ROBO_SUB4#, #SORTS#, NOW() )

UPDATE MSN_MST SET MSN_NM=#MSN_NM#, MSN_DESC=#MSN_DESC#, MSN_TP=#MSN_TP#, ROBO_CNT=#ROBO_CNT#, ROBO_MAIN=#ROBO_MAIN#, ROBO_SUB1=#ROBO_SUB1#, ROBO_SUB2=#ROBO_SUB2#, ROBO_SUB3=#ROBO_SUB3#, ROBO_SUB4=#ROBO_SUB4#, SORTS=#SORTS#, MOD_DT=NOW() WHERE MSN_ID = #MSN_ID#
